QuestData.Title: A Gift For Chee Chee
QuestData.Description: That crazy Chee Chee is actually pretty neat. Mah always said that hozen were nothing but trouble, but... I guess he's just a better hozen then the rest of them.$b$bWe should do something nice for him! Those mountain hozen in the west make some really fancy stir fry, and keep bowls of it inside their little hozen houses.$b$bI bet Chee Chee would love some!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Mah said hozen have filthy mouths. It looks pretty clean to me...
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain an Authentic Valley Stir Fry.
